stories.title: Autocomplete Suggestions for Color Names
stories.description: As a user, I want to see autocomplete suggestions while typing color names so that I can select the correct color quickly.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the auto-complete input is visible, When I type a character B, Then a dropdown should appear with suggestion as Blue.
Given suggestions are visible, When I select a suggestion Blue using arrow keys or mouse click, Then the input field should be populated with the selected color name.
Given multiple suggestions, When I continue typing B, Then the suggestions list should update to match the current input as Black.

stories.title: Display Placeholder Text in Input Field
stories.description: As a user, I want the input field to display placeholder text so that I know what to type.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the auto-complete input field, When the field is empty, Then 'Type multiple color names' should be displayed as placeholder text.

stories.title: Ensure Visibility of UI Elements
stories.description: As a user, I want all key UI elements to be visible so that I can understand and interact with the interface.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page loads, When I view the interface, Then the heading 'Auto Complete' should be visible.
Given the input field is present, When no interactions have occurred, Then the input box and suggestion dropdown should not have any data pre-selected.
